content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion on the rental price, please propose a figure that you find suitable for this desirable location and well-appointed unit. Remembering that our objective is to achieve the highest possible price, I'll carefully consider your offer while negotiating later on.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am aware that the apartment is in a great location and well-appointed. However, I am a student and I am looking for something quite affordable. I would like to offer 300 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues the apartment's potential worth in this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. Considering the average price for a one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg, I can offer 400 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While recognizing your financial situation, I must emphasize that this apartment is exceptional in terms of location and features, warranting a higher rental price. However, in light of your revised proposal, I agree to the price of 420 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
